comments.body: I believed we agreed to rename this to something more significant, can you act on it please?
yes, yes, yes... just did not want to do this renaming right away, wanted to get it working and passing all the tests first.

diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@

+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+-- V34: Add a sequential row_id to participant_events
+--
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+
+-- 1. add the column
+alter table participant_events add column row_id bigserial;
